p: We found a strong and positive correlation between the species’ citations in the two free list events (rs = 0.79; p < 0.001). The top 3 most cited species were the same in both moments. They were Mentha × vilosa Huds. ( n 1 = 46 and n 2 = 48), Amburana cearensis (Alemão.) A.C. Sm. ( n 1 = 40 and n 2 = 43) and Lippia alba (Mill.) N. E.Br. ex. Britton and P. Wilson ( n 1 = 39 and n 2 = 43).
